mapper.insert: insert into file(uuid, save_dir, file_name, file_type, bno, file_size) values(#{uuid}, #{saveDir}, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{bno}, #{fileSize})
mapper.update: update board b set has_file = (select count(*) from file f where f.bno = b.bno) where bno = #{bno};
update board b set has_file = has_file - 1 where b.bno = (select f.bno from file f where f.uuid = #{uuid});
